lyrics:
36 contributorscool out lyricsintro
cool out cool out

verse 1
just before i go
yes i know that im losing control and

im standing on your front porch saying dont go

cool out cause baby i dont think im the one for you

so cool out stay high stay fresh play nice
and just cool out cause baby i dont think im the one for you
so cool out

verse 2
